data.eml:eml: Morphology of the first zoea of Chaceon affinis (A. Milne-Edwards & Bouvier, 1894) and occurrence of Chaceon spp. larvae (Decapoda: Brachyura: Gerynonidae) in the Canary Islands waters, Northeastern Atlantic

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Landeria, José M., Tamura, Hiroaki (2018): Morphology of the first zoea of Chaceon affinis (A. Milne-Edwards & Bouvier, 1894) and occurrence of Chaceon spp. larvae (Decapoda: Brachyura: Gerynonidae) in the Canary Islands waters, Northeastern Atlantic. Zootaxa 4413 (3): 579-585, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4413.3.11
